data.question: What is the empirical formula of PCMOF-17?
At what temperature and relative humidity was the highest proton conductivity of PCMOF-17 observed?
Is the proton conductivity of PCMOF-17 higher in powder form or in single crystal form along the {-110} face at 25 °C and 40% RH?
data.answer: Single crystal form along the {-110} face

data.question: True or False: The proton conductivity of PCMOF-17 decreases significantly at 60% RH.
What method was used for the impedance measurements of PCMOF-17?
What is the activation energy of the proton conduction for PCMOF-17?
True or False: The crystal system of PCMOF-17 is cubic.
What is the space group of PCMOF-17?
True or False: The proton conductivity of PCMOF-17 is similar to Nafion 117 at 31 °C and RH = 40%.
What is the main conduction pathway in PCMOF-17?
data.answer: Through the continuous hydrogen bonded pathways in the ab crystallographic plane.

data.question: True or False: PCMOF-17 demonstrates bulk conductivity at 40% RH even when it degrades significantly at 60% RH.
What is the crystal size of PCMOF-17?
True or False: The proton conduction of PCMOF-17 in the single crystal form along the c axis is higher than in the other two directions.
What is the role of the 2D hydrogen bonding network in PCMOF-17?
True or False: The synthesis of PCMOF-17 involves heating a mixture of 5-sulfoisophthalic acid sodium salt, InCl3·XH2O, DMF, Ethanol, and HNO3 at 120 °C for 24 hours.
What is the yield of the PCMOF-17 synthesis?
True or False: The proton conductivity of PCMOF-17 is independent of the MOF pore structure.
What is the crystal system of PCMOF-17?
What is the main advantage of PCMOF-17 over other proton conducting MOFs?
data.answer: High proton conductivity at low humidity and moderate temperature.

data.question: True or False: The proton conductivity of PCMOF-17 is measured using alternating current (AC) impedance spectroscopy.
